content: pdf digital download crochet pattern english only - no refunds on digital products the rocky mountain colourblock pullover is worked in one piece from the top-down in simple double_crochet stitches making it a great beginner sweater pattern the pullover can easily be modified to any length and the pattern works up quickly with no seaming this cozy and modern sweater is crocheted in knit picks /wecrochet palette fingering weight yarn and includes a step-by-step tutorial for size small on youtube difficulty easy written in standard american terms yarn palette fingering weight- 100% peruvian highland wool 231 yds/50g shown in oyster brindle and asphalt heather https //shrsl com/3gj14 small size 2 oyster 2 brindle and 3 asphalt - see the blog/chart for xs-5x hook - use code mjs15 for 15% off us 6/g 4mm us 7/g+ 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge materials -find them here https //amzn to/3e5ngly tapestry needle stitch markers scissors measuring tape steamer woolwash - https //shrsl com/3gp7x gauge 20 sts and 10 row equal to 4 in double_crochet with 4 5mm hook 7 sts and 3 row equal to 1 in ribbed pattern with 4mm hook video link https //youtu be/3sw6o9flaso you are welcome to sell finished products from this design please reference mj s off the hook as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
